text: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's official wedding photographer has said he is honoured to have the opportunity to capture the next chapter in the couple's ` ` wonderful love story''. Alexi Lubomirski, 42, who photographed the pair for their engagement, will be at Windsor Castle next month to take the official wedding shots, Kensington Palace announced. A series of romantic images taken by Mr Lubomirski of Harry and his bride - to - be, including an intimate black and white portrait of the couple embracing, were released in December to mark their forthcoming nuptials. Mr Lubomirski said he is delighted to be named the official photographer for the big day. ` ` I could not be more thrilled or honoured to photograph this historic occasion.
